smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MapsFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getMarkerIcon appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function doInBackground is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MapsFragment' with '43' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainActivity' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findPreference("navBar") cannot be safely cast to CheckBoxPreference.
findPreference("language") cannot be safely cast to ListPreference.
newValue cannot be safely cast to String.
applicationContext.getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to ConnectivityManager.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SettingsFragment.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AboutFragment.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of IconRenderer.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ClusterPoint.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of the class or object.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of DonateActivity.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

instances.message: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (location.latitude in 39.420..39.515) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: location.latitude in 39.420..39.515
Parentheses in (location.longitude in -0.572..-0.272) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: location.longitude in -0.572..-0.272

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements

smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file IconRenderer.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file ContextWrapper.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file SplashActivity.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class BikeStation defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: OptionalWhenBraces
smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

instances.message: Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.android.billingclient.api.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
